segments.text: I hear you're moving to New York .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I found a very good job down there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we'll certainly miss you in Boston .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to miss you folks , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll drop you a line as soon as I get there .
segments.speaker: S2
